snippet.title: FRAGMENT - Video Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Fragment is available for PC here: https://charlieworkproductions.itch.io/fragment

--

Fragment is a survival horror where you infiltrate an abandoned facility in search of the Fountain of Life. The people down there use to mine for crystal fragments, but the air turned them into horrific Monsters!

It's your job to take as many fragments as you can and purify them in the Fountain. Your ammo is limited and monsters lurk behind the locked doors. Can you reach the Fountain?

--

This game was a group effort to make, i was the director, animator and programmer and my friends each had their own roles, from logo design, music, to environment design. It was a fun four months to make, the best part to me was the Voice Acting which i feel makes the game all the more fun!

For those waiting on Sunset Witch X Devlogs, I will return to them when i've had some time to rest as there's been a lot of stuff going on. They may come out less frequently though as working on the game and posting videos is very time consuming. I will update when i have a plan.

--
